title: varum iDarellAm varaTTum
sahitya:
varum IdarellAm varaTTum vandAl vaDivElan tuNai undan viruppE


anupallavi

  arumaiyum perumaiyum azhindozhindAlum arumukham parivuDan arum tuNai purivAn


caraNam    vEla adu vandiDum veTriyum tandiDum viruppamum kUDiDum vinaigaLum OdoDum
shIlamum viLangiDum kOlamum tulangiDum shen tamizh cintaiyil cintaiyulagirttiDum
